This repo provides different configurations of `i3` window manager. Themes are divided into branches of the repo. You can find diffrent thems through diffrent branches. Below list shows the configuration list precent in this repo.

- i3 - Window Manager - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://i3wm.org/docs/)
- polybar - Status Bar - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://github.com/polybar/polybar)
- rofi - Application Launcher - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://github.com/davatorium/rofi)
- neofetch - Fetch Tool - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://github.com/dylanaraps/neofetch)
- kitty - Terminal - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/)
- nvim - Editor - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://neovim.io/)
- ranger - File Browser - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://github.com/ranger/ranger)
- alacritty - Terminal - [ðŸ”— wiki](https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty)
